name: Duality universe
description:
I made this game in less than two days for global game jam and the theme was "Duality".

a cute platformer game where you play two characters in two different universe, they need each other to avoid obstacles and win the level.

currently the game has 7 levels and maybe will add more levels later depends on how the people like it.

Enjoy :)
